last_episode_to_air.name: Last Chance to Dance
last_episode_to_air.overview: It's Nationals. Glo puts on the most dramatic routine of her career, challenging Ashlan to deliver the performance of her life. Gina and Audrey's solo rematch causes cracks in the team, which leaves everyone wondering who Glo will bring back next...

name: Dance Moms: A New Era
overview: Glo Hampton, who wants to take her students and prestigious dance school Studio Bleu to the next level – competing nationally every week. But the road to glory won’t be an easy one. Coach Glo must juggle her tiny but mighty dancers, their scheming moms, and ensuing meltdowns, all while ruling with a tender but tough iron fist. Will Glo and her dance team persevere amidst the dramatics?

episodes.name: A New Era
episodes.overview: The next generation of the Junior Elite Competition Team from Studio Bleu hits the stage; the pressure is on from their instructor Glo, their mums, and the dance world as these seven dancers try to shatter expectations.

episodes.name: Stung by the Queen Bee
episodes.overview: Reeling from a 6th place loss, the team focuses all their energy on an emotional group dance. Chaos ensues at competition when new mom Corinne realizes messing with queen bee Tammi was more like kicking a hornet's nest.

episodes.name: Pointe of No Return
episodes.overview: When Glo gambles on putting Audrey on pointe in a difficult ballet routine in Atlantic City, no one can predict the shockingly unlucky turn of events at competition. Meanwhile, Ashlan is assigned a solo to defend her spot on the team.

episodes.name: Add Insult to Injury
episodes.overview: Audrey gets benched after her injury and Tammi ghosts the team. Glo considers bringing in a new dancer, sparking fear throughout the studio. Meanwhile, when frenemies Domenica and Roxce go head-to-head over their daughters' trios it gets personal.

episodes.name: New Mom, New Problems
episodes.overview: Recovered from her injury, Audrey plans to reclaim her top spot until Glo brings in new dancer Gina. Emotions run high after Glo cuts a dancer from the group dance. Meanwhile, Mina is forced to grow up and say goodbye to her best friend.

episodes.name: After Every Storm a Rainbow
episodes.overview: With Nationals in mind, Glo makes Gina a member of the team and will cut anyone who isn't delivering. Smiley and Leilah's spots at nationals are in jeopardy. While the stress of the competition causes Ashlan to reach a breaking point.

episodes.name: Recipe for Disaster
episodes.overview: Glo challenges the girls with her most difficult dance to decide who competes at Nationals. Roxce and Jing go to war when Bellatrix is pitted against Gina for solos. After Ashlan threatened to quit last week, she is presented with a difficult decision.

episodes.name: Glo Don't Give with Both Hands
episodes.overview: All eight dancers perform as a group for the first time where Audrey must complete a precarious trick. Mina is challenged with a difficult spy-themed solo while Ashlan is cast as a beauty queen in hers. It's anyone's guess who will come out on top.

episodes.name: May the Best Group Win
episodes.overview: The Team heads to Regionals in Miami. In an unexpected twist, Glo splits the girls into two group numbers to compete against each other. Tempers flare as Audrey and Gina go head-to-head in a bid to lead the group at Nationals.

episodes.name: Last Chance to Dance
episodes.overview: It's Nationals. Glo puts on the most dramatic routine of her career, challenging Ashlan to deliver the performance of her life. Gina and Audrey's solo rematch causes cracks in the team, which leaves everyone wondering who Glo will bring back next...
